THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON

2
2020/KER/774
Crl.MC 6910/2019
-2-
ORDER
Dated this the 8th day of January 2020

Petitioners are accused in CC No.1147/2017 on the
files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-
I, Manjeri for having allegedly committed offences
punishable under Sections 341, 323, 427, 294(b) read
with Section 34 IPC.

2. The defacto complainant is the second
respondent. He has appeared through counsel and filed
affidavit to the effect that the matter has been
amicably settled with the petitioners and that he has
no grievance against them. A report to that effect
has also been obtained from the investigating officer
through the learned Senior Public Prosecutor. The
petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents. No
public interest is involved.

In the result, the Criminal M.c. is allowed and
the entire proceedings as against the petitioners
herein in CC No.1147/2017 on the files of the Judicial
First Class Magistrate's Court-I, Manjeri shall stand

Bier

. c

El a B

2020/KER/774
Crl.MC 6910/2019
-3-
quashed under Section 482 Ccr.PC and the
petitioners/accused are discharged.
Sd/-
ASHOK MENON
